overview: The age old question that has plagued us for decades is about to be answered! Flirty & playful blondes seduce with their charms; seductive & mysterious brunettes smoldering their prey. From the sultry gaze of Heather Vuur to the untameable while child that is Cassidey, these women all have one thing in common: their insatiable sexual appetite. Let's see who really has more fun, blondes or brunettes...or will it be you?
title: Ninn Wars 2: Blondes Vs Brunettes
